ISSUE.TITLE: expose K8S/OCP credentials for playbook use
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY We have a bearer token credential type that is used for the container group feature. There does not appear to be a reason it cannot be used for general playbook runs. The `k8s` ansible module accepts `K8S_AUTH_HOST` and `K8S_AUTH_API_KEY` env vars.
